message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $10,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Could you do $8,500?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $9,250?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we split the difference and land at $9,000?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $9,600?
Alice, I appreciate you negotiating, but I need to be closer to $9,000 to make this work. Would you consider $9,300?
